other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Moderate amount of intraperitoneal free air, suspected site of perforation from the sigmoid colon. Colonic diverticulosis noted diffusely, thickening of the sigmoid colon with adjacent thickening of a small bowel segment, probable mild focal small bowel ileus.

other_tests.procedure_name: Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay for C. difficile
